definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: I want something for athlete's foot.
This helps cure athlete' s foot, too.
sentences.chinese: 這還可以幫助治療香港腳。

sentences.english: How do you treat athlete's foot?
sentences.chinese: 請問香港腳要如何治療？

sentences.english: I think I got athlete's foot from those bowling shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我想我是從那些保齡球鞋中傳染到香港腳的。

sentences.english: Your feet stink. I guess you have athlete's foot.
sentences.chinese: 你的腳好臭，我猜你一定是有香港腳。

sentences.english: Then he blamed me when he got athlete's foot on his doink.
sentences.chinese: 後來他得了皮蘚時候居然責怪我有香港腳。

sentences.english: Your feet stink. I guess you haudio-videoe athlete's foot.
sentences.chinese: 你的腳好臭，我猜你一定是有香港腳。

sentences.english: Athlete's foot patient can soak in the tea tree to confront the wound.
sentences.chinese: 香港腳患者，可浸泡茶樹花水與黴菌對抗。

sentences.english: A fungal infection of the skin, especially athlete's foot.
sentences.chinese: 腳氣，香港腳皮膚的一種細菌性感染，尤其是。

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
